Posts.Content: I know where that is! Are you doing your treatments in Macon? Since you joined in May I guess you've been on this journey a while. I hope it's going well.
Posts.Title: Is anybody from Georgia?

Posts.Content: They're still making deals to get the needed 60 votes to avoid a filibuster. So contact your Senators about this provision. If it's in the bill and passes the Senate then we need to contact our Representative so the House doesn't agree to this.
Posts.Title: Senate Health Care Bill Would Allow Insurers to Limit Coverage for Seriously Ill Patients

Posts.Content: I've only had one treatment so far, #2 is tomorrow but here's the rundown for treatment 1. I took a crossword puzzle book, a paperback, and my blackberry. A friend went with me and brought a movie and a magazine for me. We talked to each other and to others around us as it is a group room. Watching tv/movies requires headphones and I found I liked shutting out the noise around me for a while. My friend got us lunch and snacks as we were there all day.
Posts.Title: Chemo Chicks: What did you do during your chemo treatments?

Posts.Content: Glad to know the shot is a minor event. My onc told me it kicks in when the white cells start dropping which may be several days out. She said the pain is often in the hips, sternum, and femur area where there is a high concentration of marrow. Angela
